title: Sir VValter Ravvleighs ghost, or Englands forewarner Discouering a secret consultation, newly holden in the Court of Spaine. Together, with his tormenting of Count de Gondemar; and his strange affrightment, confession and publique recantation: laying open many treacheries intended for the subuersion of England.
author: Scott, Thomas, 1580?-1626.
notes: The imprint is false; actual place of publication conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
